name: Wormadam Plant Cloak
flavorText: When BURMY evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon's body. The cloak is never shed.

abilities.name: Plant Cloak
abilities.text: If Wormadam Plant Cloak has 2 or more Grass Energy attached to it, Wormadam Plant Cloak gets +40 HP.

attacks.name: Leaf Hurricane
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon has fewer remaining HP than Wormadam Plant Cloak, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
